title: Close Enough
description: Today, more and more of us are living through the people on our screens and in our headphones. It's not real, but for many of us, it's close enough.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
content:encoded: Today, more and more of us are living through the people on our screens and in our headphones. It's not real, but for many of us, it's close enough.
